column2: Bridegrooms/brides are Hong Kong residents and brides/bridegrooms are from the Mainland
column3: 新郎/新娘為香港人而新娘/新郎為內地人

column2: Percentage of Mainland-Hong Kong cross-boundary marriages by age difference
column3: 年齡差異劃分的內地與香港跨境婚姻數目的百分比

column2: Median of age difference between bridegrooms and brides (year) (The age difference refers to the age of the bridegroom minus the age of the bride.  A figure larger than zero means that the age of the bridegroom is higher.)
column3: 新郎與新娘的年齡差異中位數（年）(年齡差異是指新郎的年齡減去新娘的年齡，大於零的數字表示新郎的年齡較大。)
